I Agree To The Terms & Condition
Enter your username and e-mail address we\'ll send you a email to reset your password
Please enter a valid email address(aa@gmail.com)

You may not order or obtain products or services from the Site if you (a) do not agree to these Terms, (b) are not the older of (i) at least 18 years of age or (ii) legal age to form a binding contract with Woolrich, or (c) are prohibited from accessing or using the Site or any of the Site’s contents, goods or services by applicable law.
These Terms are subject to change by Woolrich without prior written notice at any time, in our sole discretion. The latest version of these Terms will be posted on this Site, and you should review these Terms before purchasing any product or services that are available through this Site. Your continued use of this Site after a posted change in these Terms will constitute your acceptance of and agreement to such changes.
These Terms are an integral part of the General Terms of Use that apply generally to the use of our Site. You should also carefully review our Privacy Policy before placing an order for products or services through this Site.
1. Placing Your Order & Order Cancellation All orders placed on the Site are subject to email confirmation by us; we may choose not to accept any orders in our sole discretion. Please note that the products displayed on the Site may be out-of-stock or discontinued, and availability is not guaranteed. You agree that your order is an offer to buy, pursuant to these Terms, all products listed in your order. If accepted, your confirmation e-mail will contain your order number and details of the items you have ordered. Registered users may also refer to the “My Account” section of the Site for the details of their order.
2. Prices All prices are in US Dollars. All prices posted on this Site are subject to change without notice. The price charged for a product will be the price in effect at the time the order is placed and will be set out in your order confirmation email. Price increases will only apply to orders placed after such changes. Posted prices do not include taxes or charges for shipping and handling. All such taxes and charges will be added to your merchandise total and will be itemized in your shopping cart and in your order confirmation email. We are not responsible for pricing, typographical, or other errors in any offer by us and we reserve the right to cancel any orders arising from such errors.
Before finalizing and placing your order you are advised to check the final sale price, and total amount due, which is inclusive of sales tax applied in accordance with applicable state and local regulations based on your shipping address.
The amount of sales tax charged on your order will depend upon various factors, including, for example, the item purchased, sales price and destination of the shipment. Since sales tax regulations are subject to change, please refer to your final invoice with the shipping confirmation e-mail to see the amount of sales tax collected on the associated order.
3. Shipping Costs You are responsible for the shipping costs associated with the delivery of the products you purchase on the Site as specified on your order confirmation.
4. Shipments and Delivery The specific terms of shipment and delivery of the products are outlined in detail on the “Shipping & Delivery”section on this Site and are an integral and essential part of these General Terms and Conditions of Sale.
Shipping and delivery dates are estimates only and cannot be guaranteed. We are not liable for any delays in shipments.
You bear all risk of loss and damage to the products from the time the same have cleared our fulfillment house. Delivery is deemed complete and title to the products passes to you upon acceptance of shipment by a common carrier.
5. Payments Payment for the orders of products on the Site and the corresponding shipping and delivery costs must be made by you at the time the order is submitted, using the data provided in the order form. You can use the following payment methods:
- Credit card or debit card
- Paypal
- Klarna
You represent and warrant that (i) the credit card and payment information you supply to us is true, correct, and complete, (ii) you are duly authorized to use such credit card or payment method for the purchase, (iii) charges incurred by you will be honored by your credit card company, and (iv) you will pay charges incurred by you at the posted prices, including all applicable taxes, if any.
The use of credit and debit cards and the financial information (e.g. the credit/debit card number, user codes, verification of the owner and expiration date, etc.) will be protected by encryption protocols and specific security systems for online transactions. Please refer to our Privacy Policy for more information on how Woolrich handles and protects your data. Woolrich will only use the data to complete the procedures for the purchase of the products and to issue refunds if the products are returned, or if it is necessary to prevent or report cases of fraud committed on the Site to the police.
6. Product Quality and Characteristics The products offered for sale on the Site bear one or more Woolrich trademarks and/or manufacturers authorized by Woolrich. The Products for sale on the Website are new articles only, with the characteristics and standards typical of Woolrich garments.
The main characteristics of each product are listed on the relevant product page of the Site.
All the products offered for sale on the Site have an ID tag secured with a single-use seal. This tag and its seal are an integral part of the product. Their removal or damage will result in the forfeiture of the right of return or exchange unless otherwise required by applicable law.
Please note that while we have tried to accurately display the colors of products, the actual colors you see will depend on your monitor and browser and may not be accurate.
7. Returns and Refunds For more information about returns and exchanges of Woolrich products, please refer to the Returns and Refunds section of the Site, which forms an integral part of these General Terms and Conditions of Sale.
